pages.text: Tamed $(marked)Wolves$() are precious creatures; when their friend is in need, they are usually ready to help, even risking their own life.$(br)When bound as a familiar, Dogs will increase the effectivity and especially durability of $(l:bewitchent:poppets/poppet_practice)$(marked)poppets$().$(br)Their protective spirit will also naturally increase the armor of their witch.
